text: Beketovka () is a rural locality (a selo) in Mayachninsky Selsoviet of Ikryaninsky District, Astrakhan Oblast, Russia. The population was 393 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 1 km east from Ikryanoye. ==World War II== During World War II, after the Battle of Stalingrad, the largest POW camp for surrendered German forces was Camp #108 near Beketovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ikryaninsky District
title: Beketovka
